channel.title: comms on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in comms on Damien Saunders

item.title: How to make mobile part of your marketing strategy
item.description: Should you be worried that you don’t have an iPhone app? Do you know if you’re website works on a mobile? what about mobile SEO? It is very important for CEO’s and CMO’s to add mobile to their communications and marketing strategy. The fact that most companies have yet to build a mobile website shows you are not alone and many companies want to know what they should do first.
